means: 用力咀嚼（某物），大嚼( munch的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Joe's other peculiarity was that he was constantly munching hard candy.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔还有一个怪癖，就是喜欢不停地嚼硬糖。

sentence.Network_en: Sheep were munching their way through a yellow carpet of leaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 绵羊边吃边走，穿行在厚厚的一层黄色落叶中间。
他在津津有味地嚼着苹果.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Eating in front of the television fosters mindless munching ., 在电视前面吃饭让人漫不经心的咀嚼食物.
Others are standing around munching on the their bountya look of ecstasy on their faces ., 有些人正站在旁边吧唧吧唧地嚼着他们的犒劳食品 , 脸上洋溢着陶醉的表情.

list.abs: 孟克（MUNCH）的知名画作－－The Scream~＂呐喊＂。右图－－Despair（绝望）。
蒙克（munch）230g4K素描纸 4K 230g 防霉抗蛀不含酸性无漂白剂
新艺术运动_百度百科 ... 尤金·格拉谢特( Eugene Grasset) 爱德华·蒙克( Edvard Munch) 亨利·凡德·威尔德( Henry van de Velde).
挪威画家孟克（Edvard Munch）的〝呐喊〞总共有4个版本，其中3幅由挪威博物馆馆藏，拍卖的版本是唯一私人收藏品，今天在纽约 …

entry.def: If you munch food, you eat it by chewing it slowly, thoroughly, and rather noisily.

example.tran: 卢克津津有味地吃着鸡肉三明治。

example.ex: Across the table, his son Benjie munched appreciatively...
example.tran: 桌子对面，他儿子本吉有滋有味地吃着。

auth_sentence.content: Shrieve found Jumbo there, munching greedily from a plate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shrieve found Jumbo there, munching greedily from a plate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shrieve found Jumbo there, munching greedily from a plate.

auth_sentence.content: He ripped open the silver foil bag and started munching.

auth_sentence.content: We came back through fields of Longhorn cattle munching methodically.
auth_sentence.res_content: We came back through fields of Longhorn cattle munching methodically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We came back through fields of Longhorn cattle munching methodically.
